column1: Software Engineer;;30/12/2024;;36 uren per week;Den Haag;26/04/2024;Ministry of Justice and Security (JenV);;Open;[(Profile(Name: John Doe
column11: Experience: 10 years development experience in Java
column19: 'Subject: Application for the position of Software Engineer at Ministry of Justice and Security (JenV)\n\nFrom: John Doe on behalf of MareVisie B.v.
column22: \n\nI am writing to express my interest in the Software Engineer position at the Ministry of Justice and Security as advertised. With a robust background in technical computing and software engineering
column23: complemented by over a decade of hands-on experience in programming and development
column24: I am excited about the opportunity to contribute to your team.\n\nI hold a Bachelor’s degree in Technical Computer Science and Software Engineering
column25: and I am certified in both Scrum Foundations and Scrum Master. My professional journey spans more than ten years
column26: during which I have developed a deep proficiency in Java and Python. My technical toolkit also includes extensive experience with Postgres
column30: all of which I have utilized in various projects over the past six years.\n\nMy experience in the forensic domain aligns with the specialized needs of your department. Over the past five years
column31: I have honed my skills in Docker and other containerization technologies
column32: ensuring efficient and scalable application deployment. This experience is underpinned by a strong foundation in Kubernetes and Istio
column33: enhancing my capability in managing complex deployments.\n\nI am particularly drawn to this role at JenV due to its emphasis on critical problem-solving within the forensic domain—an area where I have both passion and experience. My approach to software development is both systematic and creative
column34: allowing me to deliver innovative solutions that are robust and reliable. I am keen on the aspect of collaboration mentioned in the job description
column35: as I thrive in environments where teamwork and knowledge sharing are prioritized.\n\nMy career is marked by a commitment to achieving results and advancing organizational goals. I am adept at translating complex requirements into actionable development plans
column36: ensuring that all solutions meet the high standards expected in government applications. My communication skills
column38: have been refined through years of presenting complex ideas to diverse audiences
column39: making me well-prepared to engage with stakeholders at all levels.\n\nI am enthusiastic about the possibility of bringing my unique expertise to the Ministry of Justice and Security. I am confident that my background and skills align well with the goals of your team
column40: and I am eager to contribute to your success. Thank you for considering my application. I look forward to the possibility of discussing how I can contribute to your esteemed ministry.\n\nWarm regards

column1: Requirements: Minimaal een afgeronde bachelor opleiding in Technische Informatica en/of Software Engineering
column2: Minimaal een certificaat in Scrum Foundations en/of Scrum Master
column3: Minimaal zeven (7) jaar werkervaring met diverse programmeertalen en tools waaronder in ieder geval Java en/of Python
column4: Minimaal vijf (5) jaar werkervaring met Postgres en/of Elasticsearch en/of Bamboo en/of Javascript
column5: Minimaal vijf (5) jaar werkervaring met het werken in het forensisch domein
column6: Minimaal drie (3) jaar werkervaring met Kubernetes en/of docker en/of Istio
column7: Aantoonbare ervaring met het schrijven van automatische testen
column8: Aantoonbare ervaring in het vertalen van requirements naar technische en/of functionele analyses

column1: Preferences: Een creatieve puzzelaar die zich graag vastbijt in complexe uitdagingen en doorgraaft tot de oplossing gevonden is
column2: Een teamspeler die energie krijgt van samenwerken en graag het initiatief neemt
column3: Kritisch en werkt op een nauwkeurige en systematische manier en toetst resultaten bij collega's
column4: Een pragmatische aanpak vanuit een oplossingsgerichte instelling
column5: Graag kennis en ervaringen deelt en nieuwsgierig is naar de ideeën van anderen
